subject: News and News Media
Athletics and Sports
Women and Girls
Minorities
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: The number of jobs held by women and members of minority groups in sports departments at newspapers and websites remains low, according to a study by the University of Central Florida’s Institute for Diversity and Ethics in Sports
snippet: The number of jobs held by women and members of minority groups in sports departments at newspapers and websites remains low, according to a study by the University of Central Florida’s Institute for Diversity and Ethics in Sports
